info.ability: Lose one influence. Gain one energy per card that Mukaki's side has
info.passive: When Makari-Hari's side uses a spell card, draw one card

info.ability: Lose one influence. Add one cooldown to Makari-Hari and swap hands with Makari-Hari's side
info.passive: Mukaki's side can play up to two cards in a trial

info.ability: Remove one energy from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side
Remove one card from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side
Discard your entire hand and draw two cards. If their elements match, draw two more. Repeat until they don't match (Extra cards will be discarded)

info.passive: When a trial begins, reveal Makari-Hari's/Mukaki's hand

info.ability: Swap your hand with random cards from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's hand
